TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TcpListener extends System.Object

summary.span: 侦听来自 TCP 网络客户端的连接。

span.span: Listens for connections from TCP network clients.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供侦听和接受传入连接请求，在阻止同步模式的简单方法。The class provides simple methods that listen for and accept incoming connection requests in blocking synchronous mode. 你可以使用或连接与。You can use either a or a to connect with a . 创建使用，本地 IP 地址和端口号或只是端口号。Create a using an , a Local IP address and port number, or just a port number. 指定本地 IP 地址和本地端口号，如果你想要为您分配这些值的基础服务提供程序为 0。Specify for the local IP address and 0 for the local port number if you want the underlying service provider to assign those values for you. 如果你选择这样做，则可以使用属性来标识已指定的信息后套接字连接。If you choose to do this, you can use the property to identify the assigned information, after the socket has connected. 使用方法，以开始侦听传入连接请求。Use the method to begin listening for incoming connection requests. 将排队等待传入的连接，直到你可以调用方法或它已排队。 will queue incoming connections until you either call the method or it has queued . 可以使用两种或请求从传入的连接请求队列的连接。Use either or to pull a connection from the incoming connection request queue. 将阻止这两种方法。These two methods will block. 如果你想要避免阻止，则可以使用方法首先确定连接请求是否可在队列中。If you want to avoid blocking, you can use the method first to determine if connection requests are available in the queue. 调用方法来关闭。Call the method to close the . > [!NOTE] > 方法不会关闭任何已接受的连接。The method does not close any accepted connections. 你负责分别关闭这些连接。You are responsible for closing these separately. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建。The following code example creates a . [!code-cpp[System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener/CPP/tcpserver.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener/CS/tcpserver.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener/VB/tcpserver.vb#1)] 请参阅有关客户端示例。See for a client example.

permission.span: 若要建立一个传出连接或接受传入请求。

span.span: to establish an outgoing connection or accept an incoming request.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 port) cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Use TcpListener (IPAddress address, int port) instead")

param.name: port
param.span: 用来侦听传入的连接尝试的端口。

span.span: The port on which to listen for incoming connection attempts.

summary.span: 初始化在指定端口上侦听的 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that listens on the specified port.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数已过时。This constructor is obsolete. 使用或构造函数。Use the or constructors. 此构造函数，可指定用于侦听传入的连接尝试的端口号。This constructor allows you to specify the port number on which to listen for incoming connection attempts. 使用此构造函数，基础服务提供程序将分配的最合适的网络地址。With this constructor, the underlying service provider assigns the most appropriate network address. 如果你不关心使用哪个本地端口，则可以指定的端口号 0。If you do not care which local port is used, you can specify 0 for the port number. 在这种情况下，服务提供商将分配一个可用的临时端口号。In this case, the service provider will assign an available ephemeral port number. 如果使用此方法时，你可能会发现已使用分配了哪些本地网络地址和端口数量属性。If you use this approach, you can discover what local network address and port number has been assigned by using the property. 调用方法，以开始侦听传入的连接尝试。Call the method to begin listening for incoming connection attempts. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建使用本地端口号。The following code example creates a using a local port number. [!code-cpp[Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample/CPP/source.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample/CS/source.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample/VB/source.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Net.IPEndPoint localEP) cil managed

param.span: 一个 ，它表示将侦听器 绑定到的本地终结点。

span.span: An that represents the local endpoint to which to bind the listener .

summary.span: 使用指定的本地终结点初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified local endpoint.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数允许你指定的本地 IP 地址和端口号用于侦听传入的连接尝试。This constructor allows you to specify the local IP address and port number on which to listen for incoming connection attempts. 使用此构造函数之前，必须创建使用所需的本地 IP 地址和端口号。Before using this constructor, you must create an using the desired local IP address and port number. 将此传递到构造函数、 作为`localEP`参数。Pass this to the constructor as the `localEP` parameter. 如果你不关心哪些本地地址分配，你可以创建使用地址参数，以及基础服务提供程序将分配的最合适的网络地址。If you do not care which local address is assigned, you can create an using as the address parameter, and the underlying service provider will assign the most appropriate network address. 这可能有助于简化你的应用程序，如果你有多个网络接口。This might help simplify your application if you have multiple network interfaces. 如果你不关心使用哪个本地端口，则可以创建使用 0 作为端口号。If you do not care which local port is used, you can create an using 0 for the port number. 在这种情况下，服务提供商将分配一个可用的临时端口号。In this case, the service provider will assign an available ephemeral port number. 如果使用此方法时，你可能会发现已使用分配了哪些本地网络地址和端口数量属性。If you use this approach, you can discover what local network address and port number has been assigned by using the property. 调用方法，以开始侦听传入的连接尝试。Call the method to begin listening for incoming connection attempts. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建的实例类使用的本地终结点。The following code example creates an instance of the class using the local endpoint. [!code-cpp[Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that listens for incoming connection attempts on the specified local IP address and port number.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数允许你指定的本地 IP 地址和端口号用于侦听传入的连接尝试。This constructor allows you to specify the local IP address and port number on which to listen for incoming connection attempts. 在调用此构造函数之前你必须首先创建使用所需的本地地址。Before calling this constructor you must first create an using the desired local address. 将此传递到构造函数、 作为`localaddr`参数。Pass this to the constructor as the `localaddr` parameter. 如果你不关心分配的本地地址，指定为`localaddr`参数，并且基础服务提供程序将分配的最合适的网络地址。If you do not care which local address is assigned, specify for the `localaddr` parameter, and the underlying service provider will assign the most appropriate network address. 这可能有助于简化你的应用程序，如果你有多个网络接口。This might help simplify your application if you have multiple network interfaces. 如果你不关心使用哪个本地端口，则可以指定的端口号 0。If you do not care which local port is used, you can specify 0 for the port number. 在这种情况下，服务提供商将分配 1024年和 5000 之间可用的端口号。In this case, the service provider will assign an available port number between 1024 and 5000. 如果使用此方法时，你可能会发现已使用分配了哪些本地网络地址和端口数量属性。If you use this approach, you can discover what local network address and port number has been assigned by using the property. 调用方法，以开始侦听传入的连接尝试。Call the method to begin listening for incoming connection attempts. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建的实例类使用本地 IP 地址和端口号。The following code example creates an instance of the class using a local IP address and port number. [!code-cpp[Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample/VB/source.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Net.Sockets.Socket AcceptSocket() cil managed

summary.span: 接受挂起的连接请求。

span.span: Accepts a pending connection request.

returns.span: 用于发送和接收数据的 。

span.span: A used to send and receive data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一个返回的阻止方法可用于发送和接收数据。 is a blocking method that returns a that you can use to send and receive data. 如果你想要避免阻止，使用方法来确定是否可在传入的连接队列连接请求。If you want to avoid blocking, use the method to determine if connection requests are available in the incoming connection queue. 返回初始化与远程主机的 IP 地址和端口号。The returned is initialized with the IP address and port number of the remote host. 你可以使用任一和方法中提供类与远程主机通信。You can use any of the and methods available in the class to communicate with the remote host. 完成之后使用，一定要调用其方法。When you are finished using the , be sure to call its method. 如果你的应用程序相对简单，请考虑使用方法而不是方法。If your application is relatively simple, consider using the method rather than the method. 用于发送和接收数据通过阻止同步模式下的网络提供了简单的方法。 provides you with simple methods for sending and receiving data over a network in blocking synchronous mode. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 在下面的代码示例中，方法用于返回。In the following code example, the method is used to return a . 这用于与新连接的客户端通信。This is used to communicate with the newly connected client. [!code-cpp[Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample/CPP/source.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample/CS/source.cs#4)] [!code-vb[Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample/VB/source.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<class System.Net.Sockets.Socket> AcceptSocketAsync() cil managed
Public Function AcceptSocketAsync () As Task(Of Socket)

summary.span: 接受挂起的连接请求以作为异步操作。

span.span: Accepts a pending connection request as an asynchronous operation.

returns.span: 返回 表示异步操作的任务对象。

span.span: Returns The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

returns.span: 任务对象上的 属性返回了用于发送和接收数据的 。

span.span: The property on the task object returns a used to send and receive data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不会阻止此操作。This operation will not block. 返回对象都完成后的套接字连接已被接受。The returned object will complete after the socket connection has been accepted. 中返回初始化与远程主机的 IP 地址和端口号。The returned in is initialized with the IP address and port number of the remote host. 你可以使用任一和方法中提供类与远程主机通信。You can use any of the and methods available in the class to communicate with the remote host. 完成之后使用，一定要调用其方法。When you are finished using the , be sure to call its method. 如果你的应用程序相对简单，请考虑使用方法而不是方法。If your application is relatively simple, consider using the method rather than the method. 用于发送和接收数据通过阻止同步模式下的网络提供了简单的方法。 provides you with simple methods for sending and receiving data over a network in blocking synchronous mode. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

exception.span: 尚未通过调用 来启动该侦听器。

MemberSignature.Value: Protected ReadOnly Property Active As Boolean
protected: property bool Active { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示 是否正主动侦听客户端连接。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether is actively listening for client connections.

value.span: 如果 正主动侦听，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if is actively listening; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类派生自可以使用此属性来确定如果程序当前正在侦听传入的连接尝试。Classes deriving from can use this property to determine if the is currently listening for incoming connection attempts. 属性可以用于避免冗余尝试。The property can be used to avoid redundant attempts.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AllowNatTraversal(bool allowed) cil managed

param.name: allowed
param.span: 一个布尔值，该值指定是启用还是禁用 NAT 遍历。

span.span: A Boolean value that specifies whether to enable or disable NAT traversal.

summary.span: 启用或禁用针对 实例的网络地址转换 (NAT) 遍历。

span.span: Enables or disables Network Address Translation (NAT) traversal on a instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于启用或禁用的 NAT 遍历实例。The method is used to enable or disable NAT traversal for a instance. 可能使用 Teredo、 6to4 或 ISATAP 隧道提供 NAT 遍历。NAT traversal may be provided using Teredo, 6to4, or an ISATAP tunnel. 当`allowed`参数为 false，关联的套接字上的选项设置为。When the `allowed` parameter is false, the option on the associated socket is set to . 这将显式禁止 NAT 遍历实例。This explicitly disables NAT traversal for a instance. 当`allowed`参数为 true，关联的套接字上的选项设置为。When the `allowed` parameter is true, the option on the associated socket is set to . 这可能使 NAT 遍历具体取决于系统上实施防火墙规则。This may allow NAT traversal for a depending on firewall rules in place on the system. 必须在调用之前调用方法方法，以开始侦听传入的连接请求 （之前不会绑定套接字）。The method must be invoked prior to calling the method to begin listening for incoming connection requests (before the socket is bound). 如果方法后，会调用方法，则将引发。If method is called after the method, then an will be thrown. Teredo 地址是 IPv6 地址的前缀为 2001年:: / 32。A Teredo address is an IPv6 address with the prefix of 2001::/32. Teredo 地址可以返回通过正常的 DNS 名称解析或枚举为分配给了本地接口的 IPv6 地址。Teredo addresses can be returned through normal DNS name resolution or enumerated as an IPv6 address assigned to a local interface.

exception.span: 在调用 方法之后调用 方法

span.span: The method was called after calling the method

summary.span: 开始一个异步操作来接受一个传入的连接尝试。

span.span: Begins an asynchronous operation to accept an incoming connection attempt.

returns.span: 一个 ，它引用 的异步创建。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 异步操作必须通过调用方法。The asynchronous operation must be completed by calling the method. 通常情况下，通过调用该方法`callback`委托。Typically, the method is invoked by the `callback` delegate. 此方法不会阻止该操作完成之前。This method does not block until the operation completes. 若要阻止该操作完成之前，请使用方法。To block until the operation completes, use the method. 有关使用异步编程模型的详细信息，请参阅[异步调用同步方法](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)。For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md). > [!NOTE] > 你可以调用属性返回的来标识远程主机的网络地址和端口号。You can call the property of the returned to identify the remote host's network address and port number. > [!NOTE] > 如果你收到，使用属性来获取特定的错误代码和在 MSDN 库中的 Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码文档是指[ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/)为详细错误说明。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code and refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/) for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将方法创建并连接套接字。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method to create and connect a socket. 回调委托调用方法来结束该异步请求。The callback delegate calls the method to end the asynchronous request. summary.span: 获取或设置一个 值，该值指定 是否只允许一个基础套接字来侦听特定端口。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the allows only one underlying socket to listen to a specific port.

value.span: 如果 只允许一个 来侦听特定端口，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the allows only one to listen to a specific port; otherwise, .

value.span: 在 Windows Server 2003、Windows XP Service Pack 2 及更高版本中，默认为 ；在所有其他版本中，默认为 。

span.span: The default is for Windows Server 2003 and Windows XP Service Pack 2 and later, and for all other versions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，多个侦听器可以侦听特定端口。By default, multiple listeners can listen to a specific port. 但是，只有一个侦听器可以执行网络流量发送到端口的操作。However, only one of the listeners can perform operations on the network traffic sent to the port. 如果多个侦听器尝试将绑定到特定端口，则采用更具体的 IP 地址处理发送到该端口的网络流量。If more than one listener attempts to bind to a particular port, then the one with the more specific IP address handles the network traffic sent to that port. 你可以使用属性以防止多个侦听器侦听特定端口。You can use the property to prevent multiple listeners from listening to a specific port. 将之前调用此属性设置，或调用方法并将此属性。Set this property before calling , or call the method and then set this property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取和设置属性。The following code example gets and sets the property. [!code-cpp[System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1/cpp/tcpserver.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1/CS/tcpserver.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1/VB/tcpserver.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用属性来标识用于侦听传入的客户端连接请求，套接字连接后的本地网络接口和端口号。You can use the property to identify the local network interface and port number being used to listen for incoming client connection requests, after a socket connection has been made. 您必须首先将转换这到。You must first cast this to an . 然后，你可以调用属性来检索本地 IP 地址，与属性来检索本地端口号。You can then call the property to retrieve the local IP address, and the property to retrieve the local port number. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示在其上的本地 IP 地址和端口号侦听传入连接请求。The following code example displays the local IP address and port number on which the is listening for incoming connection requests. span.span: if connections are pending; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此非阻止方法确定是否有任何挂起的连接请求。This non-blocking method determines if there are any pending connection requests. 因为和方法阻止执行，直到方法已排队的传入连接请求，方法可以用于确定连接之前尝试接受这些条款是否可用。Because the and methods block execution until the method has queued an incoming connection request, the method can be used to determine if connections are available before attempting to accept them. ## Examples 下面的代码示例检查方法。The following code example checks the method. 如果连接请求正在等待可接受，然后调用方法由。If a connection request is waiting to be accepted, then a call to the method is made. [!code-cpp[TcpListener_Pending_LocalEndPoint#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/TcpListener_Pending_LocalEndPoint/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[TcpListener_Pending_LocalEndPoint#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/TcpListener_Pending_LocalEndPoint/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[TcpListener_Pending_LocalEndPoint#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/TcpListener_Pending_LocalEndPoint/VB/source.vb#1)]

The underlying .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建侦听传入的客户端连接请求。 creates a to listen for incoming client connection requests. 类派生自可以使用此属性来获取这。Classes deriving from can use this property to get this . 使用基础返回以外的属性，如果你需要访问这些提供。Use the underlying returned by the property if you require access beyond that which provides. > [!NOTE] > 属性仅返回用来侦听传入的客户端连接请求。The property only returns the used to listen for incoming client connection requests. 使用方法接受挂起的连接请求并获取用于发送和接收数据。Use the method to accept a pending connection request and obtain a for sending and receiving data. 你还可以使用方法接受挂起的连接请求并获取用于发送和接收数据。You can also use the method to accept a pending connection request and obtain a for sending and receiving data. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. 基础检索和选项配置为超时在 10 秒后如果数据仍会保留在网络缓冲区后的连接将关闭。The underlying is retrieved and the option is configured to time out after 10 seconds if data still remains in the network buffer after the connection is closed. [!code-csharp[TcpListenerProtectedMembers1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/TcpListenerProtectedMembers1/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[TcpListenerProtectedMembers1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/TcpListenerProtectedMembers1/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 开始侦听传入的连接请求。

span.span: Starts listening for incoming connection requests.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Start() cil managed

summary.span: 开始侦听传入的连接请求。

span.span: Starts listening for incoming connection requests.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法初始化基础、 将其绑定到的本地终结点，并侦听传入的连接尝试。The method initializes the underlying , binds it to a local endpoint, and listens for incoming connection attempts. 如果收到连接请求时，方法将对请求进行排队并继续侦听其他的请求，直到你调用方法。If a connection request is received, the method will queue the request and continue listening for additional requests until you call the method. 如果接收连接请求它已排入队列的最大连接数后，它会引发客户端上。If receives a connection request after it has already queued the maximum number of connections, it will throw a on the client. 若要从传入的连接队列中删除的连接，使用方法或方法。To remove a connection from the incoming connection queue, use either the method or the method. 方法将从队列删除的连接并返回可用于发送和接收数据。The method will remove a connection from the queue and return a that you can use to send and receive data. 方法将返回可用于执行相同操作。The method will return a that you can use to do the same. 如果你的应用程序仅需要同步 I/O，使用。If your application only requires synchronous I/O, use . 有关详细行为的控件，请使用。For more detailed behavioral control, use . 连接请求队列中出现一直进行阻止这两种方法。Both of these methods block until a connection request is available in the queue. 使用方法来关闭并停止侦听。Use the method to close the and stop listening. 你负责分别关闭所接受的连接。You are responsible for closing your accepted connections separately. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何用于侦听传入的客户端连接尝试。The following code example demonstrates how is used to listen for incoming client connection attempts. [!code-cpp[System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1/cpp/tcpserver.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1/CS/tcpserver.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1/VB/tcpserver.vb#3)]

exception.span: 使用 属性获取指定的错误代码。

span.span: Use the property to obtain the specific error code.

exception.span: 获取此代码后，可以参考 MSDN 中的 Windows Sockets 第 2 版 API 错误代码文档，获取有关错误的详细说明。

span.span: When you have obtained this code, you can refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in MSDN for a detailed description of the error.

summary.span: 启动对具有最大挂起连接数的传入连接请求的侦听。

span.span: Starts listening for incoming connection requests with a maximum number of pending connection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法初始化基础、 将其绑定到的本地终结点，并侦听传入的连接尝试。The method initializes the underlying , binds it to a local endpoint, and listens for incoming connection attempts. 如果收到连接请求时，将对请求进行排队并继续侦听其他的请求，直到你调用方法。If a connection request is received, will queue the request and continue listening for additional requests until you call the method. 如果接收连接请求之后它已排入队列的最大，它将引发的连接数,客户端上。If receives a connection request after it has already queued the maximum number of connections it will throw a on the client. 若要从传入的连接队列中删除的连接，使用方法或方法。To remove a connection from the incoming connection queue, use either the method or the method. 方法将从队列删除的连接并返回可用于发送和接收数据。The method will remove a connection from the queue and return a that you can use to send and receive data. 方法将返回可用于执行相同操作。The method will return a that you can use to do the same. 如果你的应用程序仅需要同步 I/O，使用。If your application only requires synchronous I/O, use the . 有关详细行为的控件，请使用方法。For more detailed behavioral control, use method. 连接请求队列中出现一直进行阻止这两种方法。Both of these methods block until a connection request is available in the queue. 使用方法来关闭并停止侦听。Use the method to close the and stop listening. 你负责分别关闭所接受的连接。You are responsible for closing your accepted connections separately. > [!NOTE] > 使用属性来获取特定的错误代码和在 MSDN 库中的 Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码文档是指[ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/)有关错误的详细说明。Use the property to obtain the specific error code and refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/) for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何用于侦听传入的客户端连接尝试。The following code example demonstrates how is used to listen for incoming client connection attempts. [!code-cpp[System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1/cpp/tcpserver.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1/CS/tcpserver.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1/VB/tcpserver.vb#3)]

exception.span: 访问套接字时出错。

span.span: An error occurred while accessing the socket.

exception.span: 参数小于零或超出允许的最大连接数。

span.span: The parameter is less than zero or exceeds the maximum number of permitted connections.

exception.span: 基础 为空。

span.span: The underlying is null.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Stop() cil managed

summary.span: 关闭侦听器。

span.span: Closes the listener.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 关闭侦听器。 closes the listener. 在队列中的任何不可接受的连接请求将会丢失。Any unaccepted connection requests in the queue will be lost. 远程主机等待连接接受将引发。Remote hosts waiting for a connection to be accepted will throw a . 你负责分别关闭所接受的连接。You are responsible for closing your accepted connections separately. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法来关闭基础。The following code example demonstrates using the method to close the underlying . [!code-cpp[System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener/CPP/tcpserver.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener/CS/tcpserver.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener/VB/tcpserver.vb#1)]

exception.span: 使用 属性获取指定的错误代码。

span.span: Use the property to obtain the specific error code.

exception.span: 获取此代码后，可以参考 MSDN 中的 Windows Sockets 第 2 版 API 错误代码文档，获取有关错误的详细说明。

span.span: When you have obtained this code, you can refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in MSDN for a detailed description of the error.

span.para: 方法也会关闭基础，并创建一个新为。如果基础上设置任何属性之前调用方法，这些属性将不会延续到新。
The method also closes the underlying , and creates a new for the . If you set any properties on the underlying prior to calling the method, those properties will not carry over to the new .
